name: connect-four-reboot-monorepo
description: Mono repo for playing the game Connect Four as CLI or SPA.

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace connect-four-reboo-cli && npm run build --workspace connect-four-reboot-spa
scripts.test: vitest run --workspace connect-four-reboo-cli && vitest run --workspace connect-four-reboot-spa
scripts.clear: rm -Rf node_modules apps/cli/dist apps/spa/dist apps/spa/node_modules apps/cli/node_modules

author: Marmelab
